title: Best Wireless Headphones for Running 2024
content:
Finding the right headphones for your runs is crucial. Here are our top picks for wireless earbuds that stay put during exercise.

#1 Best Overall: Apple AirPods Pro 2
Excellent noise cancellation and secure fit. The H2 chip provides seamless connectivity with iPhone. Battery life of 6 hours is solid. Price: $249

#2 Best Value: Samsung Galaxy Buds 2 Pro
Great sound quality at a lower price than Apple. Works best with Samsung phones but compatible with any device. Comfortable for long runs. Price: $179

#3 Best for Fitness: Beats Fit Pro
Designed specifically for workouts. The wingtip design keeps them secure during intense activity. Owned by Apple so works great with iOS. Price: $199

#4 Best Budget: JBL Reflect Flow Pro
Solid performance at an accessible price. IP68 waterproof rating handles sweat and rain. Sound quality punches above its price. Price: $129

#5 Also Consider: Sony WF-1000XM5
Best-in-class noise cancellation. Premium sound quality. Not the most secure fit for running but excellent for gym workouts. Price: $299

Honorable Mentions:
- Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II - Amazing ANC but pricey
- Jabra Elite 85t - Great call quality
- Sennheiser Momentum Sport - Audiophile choice

Note: Pair your headphones with proper running shoes - we recommend Brooks or ASICS for cushioning on long runs. Good audio motivation helps push through tough miles!
